feed.title: AliasVault Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AliasVault: 0.16.2
entry.content:
What's New

This is a minor patch release that adds support for importing credentials from Dashlane to the import wizard. Also minor UI tweaks and updates to third-party dependencies.

Full Changelog

üöÄ New Features

  • Add dashlane importer by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/813
  • Change date format in emails component on credentials page to be shorter by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/816

üêû Bug Fixes

  • Changing password twice in a row without reloading page throws error by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/814

üß© Dependencies Updates

  • Bump HtmlAgilityPack from 1.12.0 to 1.12.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/805
  • Bump nokogiri from 1.18.4 to 1.18.8 in /docs in the bundler group across 1 directory by @dependabot in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/806
  • Bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/810

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/compare/0.16.1...0.16.2

entry.title: New release for AliasVault: 0.17.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  1. Native iOS App Launched!: release 0.17.0 marks a major step forward by introducing the official AliasVault native iOS app, now available on the iOS App Store! üéâ This new app enables native autofill features for iOS and protects your vault contents with on-device biometrics. Download it here: AliasVault for iPhone. The app is compatible with both cloud-hosted and self-hosted environments.
  2. Browser extension improvements: added extra setting toggles to the browser extensions which allow you to enable/disable the context menu and hide the autofill popup on a certain website for a specified time. Added support for shortcuts so you can trigger the autofill popup via a keyboard shortcut (works best in Chrome). Also improved autofill popup reliability so it works on more websites.
  3. Quality-of-life improvements: various other smaller improvements in the web app and browser extensions to align how credentials are displayed to better match it on all platforms.
  4. License change to AGPLv3: From this release forward, AliasVault is licensed under the AGPLv3, replacing the previous MIT license. This change is made to protect the intellectual property and long-term vision of AliasVault, while keeping it fully open and transparent. For end-users and self-hosters, nothing changes: you can continue to use, self-host, and customize AliasVault freely for personal or internal use. The new license only restricts commercial use by third parties who may otherwise profit from AliasVault without contributing back. Learn more here: License Update Announcement

Full Changelog

üöÄ New Features

  • Add native iOS app by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/822
  • Add mobile app download links to main web app by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/830
  • Update license from MIT to AGPLv3 by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/831
  • Add extra enable/disable setting toggles to browser extension by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/835

üêû Bug Fixes

  • Changing password two times in a row in client can cause vault merge issue by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/829

üß© Dependencies Updates

  • Update browser extension npm packages by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/833

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/compare/0.16.2...0.17.0

entry.title: New release for AliasVault: 0.17.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Minor bugfix release that fixes a regression introduced in the browser extension and mobile app in the 0.17.0 release.

üêû Bug Fixes

  • Browser extension autofill popup search/filter does not work correctly by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/841
  • iOS app changing password for existing credential sometimes does not get saved by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/842

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/compare/0.17.0...0.17.1

entry.title: New release for AliasVault: 0.17.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Minor bugfix release addressing an issue in the docker-compose.yml file, which mistakenly included hardcoded references to Docker container version 0.16.1. This accidental commit prevented the ./install.sh update command from properly retrieving the latest container versions, affecting self-hosted installations.

üêû Bug Fixes

  • Restore docker-compose.yml container versions to :latest by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/849

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/compare/0.17.1...0.17.2

entry.title: New release for AliasVault: 0.17.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

Minor bugfix release that makes the import process more robust. Previously the import would fail entirely if a 2FA authenticator code could not be parsed. With this change all credentials will still be imported but show an error to the user when the credential item is opened instead.

üêû Bug Fixes

  • Vault import fails if one or more 2FA tokens cannot be parsed by @lanedirt in https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/pull/853

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lanedirt/AliasVault/compare/0.17.2...0.17.3
